Comments_List: I feel that my knowledge of cultural sociology as a specific theoretical project within the discipline was greatly expanded. I gained a firm foundation of understanding for how it developed and from whom it developed, and how it interacts with other work on culture.

I really liked all the readings, and Dr. Alexander's reviews of each of the readings in class was so helpful. It was really helpful to get critiques of each of the readings, too. 

I would have liked to have had more time to interact with Dr. Alexander in class as he was lecturing, rather than waiting until the end to ask a few questions.
